lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 2 (U.P.) -- Secretary Knox joined the White House secretariat today in appealing to newspapers to cooperate in secrecy concerning President Roosevelt's cruise.
abstract: press barred; radio repts limited to navy; Knox joins White House plea for secrecy
